item.title: Physicswallah Ltd Hits Intraday Low Amid Price Pressure on 10 Feb 2026
item.description: Physicswallah Ltd experienced a notable decline today, hitting an intraday low of ₹108.8 as the stock faced significant price pressure. The share price fell by 5.23% intraday, extending a losing streak that has seen the stock drop over 10% in the past four sessions, underperforming its sector and broader market indices. Time: 8 minutes ago

item.title: Swiggy Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amidst Mixed Market Signals
item.description: Swiggy Ltd has witnessed a notable 14.9% surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. item.title: Pavna Industries Ltd Surges to Upper Circuit on Robust Buying Momentum
